content: pattern no fa-306 yarn group a measurements approx 90 x 114 cm/35½ x 45 materials drops fabel from garnstudio 50 g in each of the following colors color no 914 shoreline color no 521 blue/brown color no 522 turquoise/blue color no 162 blue sea color no 677 green/turquoise color no 542 green color no 151 guacamole color no 910 sea mist drops circular needle 80 cm/32 size 4 5 mm/us 7 or size needed to get 20 sts x 39 row in garter stitch = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm or 24 sts zig-zag pattern in width = 10 cm/4
